metadata.package-name: German spelling dictionary for use with MarkLogic Server
metadata.description: This dictionary is based on the GNU Aspell 0.60 German (Deutsches) Dictionary Package by Kevin Atkinson, based on a word list by Björn Jacke. See "sources" below for details. Greg Murray added XML tags to the word list to conform to the MarkLogic schema for spelling dictionaries.
metadata.copyright: This document carries the same license and restrictions as the sources on which it is based. See "sources" below for details. Any reproduction or modification of all or part of the information contained in this document is governed by and must be accompanied by the attached license and copyright notices. Greg Murray makes no representations about the suitability of this document for any purpose. It is provided "as is" without express or implied warranty.
